documents.document: @RafranzDavis @Ian_Eastwood Yay! Education dialogue. Love it. Were you talking about sharing learning between teachers, students, teachers and students, within classes, within schools, with other schools, with other countries? "Share" is a very broad term.
@_Ate_A_ I don't say it. I just do it LoL

I had an AT student small group this morning that I've had since September. They've come so far and I heard from their teachers that they help each other out and check in on each other even though they're in different classes. https://t.co/ilqYff5EeQ

Oh ye of little faith. Fans getting mad at @WriterRAS for doing what every writer worth anything does - having the ability to prolong the longevity of stories through conflicts and complications. #riverdale

I've realized @yvettefaye has different meal choices that clue me into what kind of work day she has had: bibimbap, sushi, xiaolongbao, burgers, steak. But when she orders a bellini bowl, that's a whole 'notha level. https://t.co/Q3v5CSpGXm
@jukedjay I'm so happy for you!!! What a great day 💜💜💜💜💜
@Sukiestyles https://t.co/5UW1SV5cEr

Dear @Sukiestyles,
It is possible to miss someone I haven't even met? Yes. Miss you. Those few clips of you in this week's meganbytes were wonderful. Have a great rest of your week. 💜
xoxo Lily
Yay!! Snow!! https://t.co/qAzZ0Lyc09

5 years ago, baby daddy went on vacation with his then GF. When they came back, they dropped by my place first. They were engaged! Later they announced it on FB. The gossip storm started. I love Calvin's other mom. Some people don't get it, but they don't need to. Fam is fam. https://t.co/XcNNIkjfjW
@yvettefaye For the weekend... https://t.co/gLJAAEbVdN
It is a cold Monday morning in Toronto. I'm here wrapped in a blankie, sipping on green tea, and waiting for my oatmeal to be ready. Then it's off to work. https://t.co/ZD7MGpWiZy
Came home after an outdoor NFL game in the snow and immediately put on @aJaDaNg's latest Vlogmas. Gotta admit, I feel really spoiled with all of these and her blog.

I wasn't able to go. Was in Buffalo for a game. I wanted you to know that I'm so proud of you, ma chere bébé @laurDIY. Toronto really came out for you. I'll see you again some time soon. Until then xoxo 💜
Bills vs Colts at New Era Field. Such a great day with great friends. Thanks for driving @Cris_o_lito and for...everything. Thank you @yvettefaye for the weekend. https://t.co/ajwhfHUIxD

What I turn my eyes to, I dwell on. What I dwell on, fills my thoughts. What I think of fills my heart. What fills my heart, I speak. I can make better choices in what gets my focus.
@laurenhummfries I may have laughed a little too loudly when I saw this...
Today marks 2 more school weeks until my Christmas Break. I'm definitely counting down.

@Ian_Eastwood It's a conversation that needed to be had. It needed to happen on a large scale and on a public platform. I don't think even you knew that it would blow up the way it did. Thanks for putting it out there.

I just watched the teaser for Ep. 5 of #MarvelsRunaways. If you can, check it out on @hulu.
And, Hulu...please give us a Canadian option because I'm trying to keep up with @Sukiestyles.

I'm getting spoiled with @aJaDaNg's Vlogmas. Daily vids? Yes, please. Going to enjoy them for as long as I can. Check out her latest here:
https://t.co/zfK0ioZeDn

@nicolekirkland Thank you for your thoughts. I didn't think either of you were being disrespectful. Diff ways of expressing ideas. I have seen, and felt, the shift in class focus esp because I'm a novice. As long as students learn & their investment is respected, that's what's most important.
No worries. You ain't crazy @ErynAllenKane. Deebo is your furbaby. You a parent now 🤣
@laurenhummfries https://t.co/CKZoLy9mie
I'm sending good vibes out to @laurenhummfries. On the other side of this stressful week for you is Christmas Break. You got this!! 💜
I haven't been feeling well lately. Nasty stomach bug over the weekend. Ready to attack Monday...quietly and from over here in the corner.
One of my lovelies got engaged over the weekend and I'm over-the-moon excited for her. 🍾💜 https://t.co/ukok2HKwtS
RT @ErynAllenKane: Hello https://t.co/tTEAqU3CiH

I'm a spec ed teacher. I love to teach & I love to learn. This is @Ian_Eastwood May '16 & May '17. I'm not a dancer. I wasn't great in class, but I learned. Class should be a place where people who want to learn can come do exactly that. It's an exchange of ideas and energy. https://t.co/BSVvo6Gyyk
@laurenhummfries When we were last there... https://t.co/5uQOguskgx

I'm getting ready for church but @Ian_Eastwood is taking everyone to school this morning.
Happy Sabbath.

@Ian_Eastwood Thinking that adding all that is the best way to get art out there....doing it for the views and not for the love. I mean, yeah, okay, jobs gotta get booked and bills gotta get paid, but you can't change frame rate during a live audition or a performance so....
Tried my hand at lettering with just markers. I need more practice. https://t.co/2MnIOJMnDf
Christmas is coming... https://t.co/mbbPmtwori

It's been a crazy long week. For different reasons. I'm looking forward to a lowkey Sabbath.

@Ian_Eastwood That's why it's so important for people like you, and people you look up to, to keep creating and sharing. Real endures. Like truth. For people who are content with less, they will never understand.

Purpose + focus + fun brought @theyounglions_ jams from house parties to industry functions to legit events. Talk about doing it for the culture. Proud of all y'all. So when's Toronto's? 🤣
I'm slowly migrating back to the land of the living. Finally off antibiotics. It's been an interesting start to 2018.
When you type in a date wrong and totally don't catch it until hours later. 1.11.17 @BrianPuspos #SLAB drop. Still a bop. Non-stop. To the top. https://t.co/N2ILuCgLoG
You need to check out #ComediansInCarsGettingCoffee on Netflix. Right now.

Recovery from this seemingly never-ending bug has been a struggle. That's why I'm so grateful for Calvin. He's doing laundry, cooking dinner, and finishing his school stuff this evening while I'm curled up in bed after a long day.
